Keywords: Assassin , Celebrity , HIVE , Injustice League , Martial Artist , Soldier
Real Name: Slade Wilson
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
THE DITRONIUM CRYSTAL...THE PERFECT PLOT DEVICE: When establishing themed teams, you may choose up to two characters on your starting force with the Justice League or Teen Titans keywords that are each less than or equal to Deathstroke's point value. The chosen characters gain Deathstroke's keywords.
SONIC BURST KATANAS: Blades/Claws/Fangs, KNOCKBACK, Pulse Wave. When Deathstroke uses Pulse Wave and hits two or more opposing characters, you may instead roll a d6 and divide the damage equal to the result among all hit characters.
I THINK YOU AND I ARE DESTINED TO DO THIS FOREVER: STOP. Mastermind, Toughness, Regeneration. When Deathstroke uses Mastermind, he considers friendly characters within 4 squares as adjacent.
